item.title: Benchmarking and Adapting On-Device Large Language Models for Clinical Decision Support
item.description: arXiv:2601.03266v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Large language models (LLMs) have rapidly advanced in clinical decision-making, yet the deployment of proprietary systems is hindered by privacy concerns and reliance on cloud-based infrastructure. Open-source alternatives allow local inference but of...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> large language model, API, arxiv, fine-tuning, model | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
